title: How to Meet or Contact Kelly Clarkson in Person, Online, or by Mail

steps.title: No, Kelly doesn’t have a public phone number or email address.
steps.content: No, Kelly doesn’t have a public phone number or email address. While you can’t call or email Kelly directly, you can reach out to her talent agents, Darryl Eaton and Cat Carson, at Creative Artists Agency (CAA) , or send fan mail and story submissions to The Kelly Clarkson Show . Send mail or make phone calls to: [1] X Research source CAA Email: info@caa.com CAA Phone: 1 (424) 288-2000 CAA Address: 2000 Ave. of the Stars Los Angeles, CA 90067 USA The Kelly Clarkson Show Address: The Kelly Clarkson Show 30 Rockefeller Plaza New York, NY 10112 USA

steps.title: Leave a comment or direct message Kelly on her social media accounts.
steps.content: Leave a comment or direct message Kelly on her social media accounts. If you want to get in touch with Kelly directly, getting her attention online may be your best bet. The only official pages run by Kelly Clarkson and her team include: Instagram Facebook X (formerly known as Twitter)

steps.title: Send fan mail and autograph requests to The Kelly Clarkson Show.
steps.content: Send fan mail and autograph requests to The Kelly Clarkson Show . If you want to write Kelly a personal letter, compliment her singing skills, or request an autographed photo, address an envelope to: [2] X Research source Kelly Clarkson c/o The Kelly Clarkson Show 30 Rockefeller Plaza New York, NY 10112 USA

steps.title: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response.
steps.content: Be sincere and include a return envelope to get a response. Briefly introduce yourself and explain how Kelly has impacted you. Whether she inspired you to start singing or pursue a healthier lifestyle, get specific about what you love about her. Finish off with a polite request to return your letter, send an autograph , or answer one of your burning questions. [3] X Research source When writing fan mail , use conversational language to showcase your personality. To make your letter stand out (and increase the likelihood of it being read), put it in a brightly-colored envelope or decorate the outside with stamps and stickers. Be genuine and specific to make your letter more meaningful. For example, instead of saying “You're so talented,” you could say, “I watched clips of your coaching lessons on The Voice , and it definitely improved my vocal range.” If you’re requesting an autograph from Kelly, send your photo in a properly stamped and self-addressed envelope. It typically takes 3+ months for a response, so try your best to be patient. [4] X Research source

steps.content: Talent Agents: Darryl Eaton and Cat Carson at Creative Artists Agency For all general inquiries, reach out to Kelly’s agents, Darryl Eaton and Cat Carson, at info@caa.com . steps.title: TV show appearances
steps.content: TV show appearances If you’re in New York City, attending a taping of The Kelly Clarkson Show is one of the best ways to see Kelly in real life, and it’s completely free! Just create a 1iota account and join the waiting list on KellyClarksonShowTickets.com . If production can fulfill your ticket request, you’ll be contacted via email and receive more information about how to prepare for the show. [8] X Research source Keep in mind that you have to be at least 18 years of age to attend a taping, regardless of whether a parent or guardian is present. You have to provide a valid photo ID to check in.

steps.title: Concerts and festivals
steps.content: Concerts and festivals Attending a concert or festival that Kelly is scheduled to perform at is a sure-fire way to see her in person. Check the tour dates on her website to see if there’s a show near you, or look up popular festivals, like iHeartRadio Music Festival, to see if she’s going to be performing. On previous tours, Kelly has offered “meet and greet” packages, where fans can meet her in person and take a photo together.

steps.title: Red carpet events
steps.content: Red carpet events Search for Kelly’s upcoming appearances on Google to see if she’s attending a movie premiere or music awards show near you. Find out when and where the event will be, and show up early to get a spot near the barricade—if you’re lucky, you might be able to snag an autograph or photo together! In the past, Kelly has attended the Grammys, Country Music Awards, American Music Awards, and Billboard Music Awards.
